@_UI_STD_INIT_@ [L]Quicklinks[/L]
[if !scratch window_override] [seti win][data session arg][/seti] [/if] [loop prefix=menu head-skip=1 list="[file include/menus/Quicklinks.txt]" lr=1 ][on-match][menu-exec menu_link]Just gets fieldnames[/menu-exec][/on-match] [menu-sub menu_link] sub { my $attrlist = shift; # Set to a default if not passed $attrlist = <{NAME}:
{/PAGE:} {PAGE?}     {NAME}
{/PAGE?} EOF my $row = shift; if(ref($row) eq 'HASH') { @menu_fieldnames = map { uc($_) } @{$row->{object}{mv_field_names}}; return; } my %line; @line{@menu_fieldnames} = @$row; if($line{MGROUP} and $CGI->{mgroup} !~ /\b$line{MGROUP}\b/) { return; } return '
' unless $line{NAME}; return $line{NAME} if ! $line{PAGE} and $line{NAME} =~ /^\s*{win}; $line{HREF} = $Tag->area( { href => $line{PAGE}, form => $line{FORM} }); $line{NAME} = errmsg($line{NAME}); $line{DESCRIPTION} =~ s/"/"/g; return $Tag->attr_list(\%line, $attrlist); } [/menu-sub] [menu-exec menu_link]{PAGE:} {NAME}:
{/PAGE:}{PAGE?}     {NAME}
{/PAGE?}[/menu-exec][/loop]
[[L]close[/L]]
[[L]edit[/L]] [if cgi mgroup eq full] [[L]short menu[/L]] [else] [[L]full menu[/L]] [/else] [/if]
